meanings.definition: A small pin with a decorative or ornamental head, used for fastening garments.
meanings.sent1: She secured her scarf with stickpins.
meanings.sent2: The stickpins held the fabric in place.
meanings.sent3: The stickpins on her dress sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like stickpins, holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The stickpins added a touch of elegance to her outfit.

meanings.definition: A pin used for holding hair in place.
meanings.sent1: She used stickpins to keep her bun in place.
meanings.sent2: The stickpins kept her hair neat and tidy.
meanings.sent3: Her stickpins were like little helpers keeping her hair in check.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a masterpiece held together by stickpins.
meanings.sent5: The stickpins added a touch of sparkle to her hairstyle.

meanings.definition: A pin used for marking a location on a map or chart.
meanings.sent1: He marked the treasure location with stickpins on the map.
meanings.sent2: The stickpins indicated important spots on the chart.
meanings.sent3: The stickpins on the map made it look like a pincushion.
meanings.sent4: The stickpins were like beacons guiding the way on the map.
meanings.sent5: The stickpins made the map easy to navigate.
